attributes.action: Recruit more Police officers to tackle crime which is on the increase all around England!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We as a country are in fear of all sorts of criminal behaviour, we have probably all had to use the emergency number 999 at least once in our lives or know somebody who has. Had the response been quick? Could the response have been quicker if there was a police unit in the area already? Could this crime have been PREVENTED if there was a police patrol in the area? Our elders are in fear to step onto the streets as soon as it gets dark. Our kids are at risk where ever they go. Something needs to be done.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
